title: #219: The Case of Jennifer Levin: "The Preppy Murder" Part 4
description:
We conclude our analysis of Jennifer Levin's murder and discuss with Lisa the final outcome of the case against the backdrop of the five part AMC and Sundance docuseries "The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park."


#HerNameWasJenniferLevin

#HerNameWasNatalieConnolly

#HerNameWasGraceMillane

#VictimsMatter

#PreppyMurder

#MaleViolence


You can watch 'The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park' about Jennifer Levin's case on AMC and Sundance

https://www.amc.com/shows/the-preppy-murder-death-in-central-park


Subscribe to the Tings and Things podcast starring Jonathan Mbaya & Simba Tsumba
